d1_text:
Npc1239:
ï¿½I wanna become a pig.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If I become a pig, I can find the mushrooms called Magic truffles.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½They're located in the swamp and can be found by scent.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You know, a Pig's nose would be enough[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½to find those great truffles by scent alone.[HALT][END]
